message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
Let's be fair, I'll take a 60/40 split this time. It's your turn next, so consider this a good starting point.
You're pushing for a 60/40 split, I'll counter with an 80/20 split. Take it or leave it!
Alice, it's clear we're both playing a game of chicken here.  Let's compromise.  I'll take 80%, you take 20%.  Next round, it's your turn. You can take it or leave it.
